name: Cursed Crusaders
description:
*Added Windows version for download for those who are getting errors with the web player.

Cursed Crusade is an homage to Armor Alley.

Get a reaper unit all the way to the enemy's base to win the game. Energy replenishes at a steady rate.

Controls:
Space = Breathe fire

1 - Spawn ranged infantry

2 - Spawn tank infantry

3 - Spawn anti-dragon unit

4 - Spawn reaper

5 - Buy and extra life
